name: BitwiseCalculator
0:
”Alexa, ask bitwise calc what is 5 and 8”
”Alexa, tell bitwise calc to left shift 5 2 positions”
”Alexa, ask bitwise calc to give me the arithmetic right shift of -7”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitwise calc
des:
Ever wanted to know how bitwise operators work? Do you wan to learn bit manipulation and computer basics? Try out this skill to perform operations on integer numbers and listen to the results.
You'll find out that bitwise is pretty handy when learning bit manipulation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
